name: SEER Primary Tumor
title: SEER Primary Tumor
notes: **Note:**   High-grade squamous intraepithelial lesions (HSIL) and anal intraepithelial neoplasia (AIN) grade II-III are not normally collected by cancer registries. AIN II-III or AIN III is reportable to standard-setters (except the Commission on Cancer). If your registry collects any of these, assign Tis.

    Submucosa (superficial invasion)

    Perianal skin
    Perineum
    Rectal mucosa or submucosa
